snippet: Angelique Kerber has a chance to become No. 1 at the Western & Southern Open. The men's bracket is wide open, too, providing an opportunity for someone outside the Big Four to claim a Masters title....
lead_paragraph: Angelique Kerber has a chance to become No. 1 at the Western & Southern Open. The men's bracket is wide open, too, providing an opportunity for someone outside the Big Four to claim a Masters title.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Going for Women's No. 1 Ranking in Cincinnati
headline.main: Kerber Going for Women's No. 1 Ranking in Cincinnati
